name: Concentrated Splash
text: You can limit the splatter of your splash weapons to increase damage against your target.
benefit:
When you deal a direct hit to a creature with a splash weapon that normally also deals splash damage, you can choose to forgo dealing splash damage. If you do, the damage dealt to the target of the direct hit increases by 50%. This damage is multiplied on a critical hit.

This feat cannot be used with an alchemist’s bombs.
text_zh: 你可以控制住泼出去的溅射武器，给予目标更大的伤害。
benefit_zh: 当你对一个生物使用本可以造成溅射伤害的溅射武器时，你可以选择不造成溅射伤害。若如此，对直接目标造成的伤害增加50%。该伤害可以被重击翻倍。该专长对炼金术士的炼金炸弹无效。
